text: Ej mardon, harcand ʙikused, hargiz natavoned, ki dar mijoni zanon (dar muhaʙʙat va xuftuxoʙ) ʙa adolat raftor kuned. Harcand ʙar adolat haris ʙosed. Aknun ki hargiz natavoned mijoni zanon tamoman adolat kuned, jakʙora ʙa sui jake az onro, ki dustas medored majl nakuned, to digarero, ki dustas namedored muallaq monad. Agar ʙa saloh oed va parhezgori kuned, Alloh omurzanda va mehruʙon ast va az kamʙudihoe, ki qaʙlan az sumo sar zada sumoro azoʙ namekunad
